author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Allena Pharmaceuticals Reports Qtrly Net Loss Per Share Attributable To Common Stockholders $0.48
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Allena Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* ALLENA PHARMACEUTICALS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES BUSINESS UPDATE
* ‚ÄçQTRLY NET LOSS PER SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS $0.48
* ALLENA PHARMA- EXPECTS EXISTING CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS, SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS SUFFICIENT TO FUND OPERATING EXPENSES, CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS INTO 2020
* CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AND SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 WAS $94.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
